    Agensi Pekerjaan & Perundingcara Bright Prospect Sdn Bhd Vacancies RA/QA/MA Trainee (Science student) x3

    November 29, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Agensi Pekerjaan & Perundingcara Bright Prospect Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for RA/QA/MA Trainee (Science student) x3 position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    Responsibilities:
    Regulatory Affairs
    • Assist in the administrative task and reviewing of documents/ related report for submission to regulatory authorities
    • Assist in the coordination and updates of trackers and records.
    • Support other functions where required for the implementation of Regulatory activities and processes
    • Other RA activities as assigned
    Quality Assurance
    • Supporting the management of product quality complaints, product security matters and product recalls
    • Documentation control including but not limited to controls of standard operating procedures and quality-related documents
    • Preparation  reports
    Medical Affairs
    • Coordinating Multi-Disciplinary meetings
    • Development  and production of HCP materials for  awareness in diagnostics partnerships of the industry
    • Development for patient education leaflet materials for diagnostic tests understanding
    • Assist and Represent Medical Affairs Manager to key account public hospitals around the country  in uplifting general pathology lab integration to central molecular pathology lab in KL
    • Assisting Medical Diagnostics function in all relevant portfolios which includes weekly reporting, data consolidation & coordination of all activities.
    Requirements:
    • Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree Medical Science, Pharmaceutical, Biotechnology or equivalent.
    • FRESHIE is encouraging to apply
    • Meticulous with multi-tasking ability and organized
    • Proficient in Microsoft Office applications especially Excel files
    • Confident, mature, resourceful with a pleasant personality and willingness to learn
    • Good communication skills with possess good oral and written skills. Proficiency in English is essential.
    • URGENT Full-Time/Contract & Immediate position(s) available.
    Bright Prospect Services
    No18, 2nd Floor, Jalan 14/14, 46100 Petaling Jaya
    Tel: 03-7954 8440
    Consultant in Charge: Janice Lim
    Email: janice@brightprospect.com.my

    Company Overview

    Now, we are calling the shots. Secure yourself with a job and career at NO COST. Call on and walk in at Bright Prospect. There's something about us. BRIGHT PROSPECT is an established recruitment agency offering free services for jobseekers. With our pool of clients from diverse sectors and industries, we aim to provide you with the solution for your ideal job and career. For candidates who are looking for career advancement, Bright Prospect will be your key to success. It has arrived, right here at your doorstep. We invite initiative and dynamic individuals to fill in the vacancies for

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream hospital job in Petaling Jaya.
